enable = bw.wire.Wire()
select_1 = bw.wire.Wire()
select_2 = bw.wire.Wire()
select_3 = bw.wire.Wire()

    output_6, output_7, output_8, output_9, output_10, output_11, output_12,
    output_13, output_14, output_15, output_16)
a = bw.signal.Demultiplexer1To16(enable, select_bus, input_, output_bus)
